name: Joni Ernst
description: Cold bitch responded 'We're all going to die' in response to SNAP and Medicaid cuts.

name: Marjorie Taylor Greene (MGT or Bad Built Butch Body)
description: This woman is just unbelievably dumb.  The only people dumber are her voters.  From 'Gazpacho Police' to Jewish Space lasers

name: Ted Cruz
description: I'll always remember this coward as the guy who fled to cancun while his voters froze during the blackouts.

name: Lauren Boebert
description: Woman's entire family is a shit show thanks to her and she's the worst of them all.  I don't use the c word lightly, but she's a grade A cunt.

name: Nancy Pelosi
description: I'm not familiar with any drama or particularly bad political moments.  What I can say is that when there are websites dedicated to a government official's insider trading, you know something is wrong.

name: Mike Johnson
description: Aside from leading the worst congress in history, this man is just creepy.  He's a faux-Christian who talks about porn monitoring with his son.  Included a youtube video of him denying 'diddling' kids for fun.

name: Chuck Schumer
description: There is nothing worse than praise from Trump and that is what Schumer received.  This man puts Israel above genocide and the American people.
